alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Beaver and northeastern Lipscomb Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 959 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southeast of Darrouzett, or 12 miles north of Lipscomb, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Follett, Darrouzett, and Slapout. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
